page.title: 12ZODIAC SIGNS - CAPRICORNIUS
page.content: It is believed that all the signs of the Zodiac can be traced on the landscape of the Glastonbury area. Our area is almost covered by the shape of Capricornius, the goat fish. The nose of the creature starts at Norwood Park farm and its head is traced by the footpath from the farm to the main Edgarley to West Pennard road at Havyatt. The horn is represented by the ridge known as Ponter's Ball. From there the back of the creature follows the main road east as far as Steanbow bridge. The feet and underparts of the body follow the river Whitelake. Footpaths form the chest and chin to complete the body.
